item.title: CVE-2023-47754|2024-08-02T21:16:43.657Z -- clever%20plugins -- delete%20duplicate%20posts
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Clever plugins Delete Duplicate Posts allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects Delete Duplicate Posts: from n/a through 4.8.9.
